caption: IDE Agent Behavior Data
description: Data describing a specific behavior or capability of an agent within an IDE environment.
name: ide_agent_behavior_data

tools_list.captions: List of tools for the agent behavior
tools_list.description: A list of tool or tool set names that are available for this agent behavior. This can include built-in tools, tool sets, MCP tools, or tools contributed by extensions.

model.captions: The AI model to use when running the behavior.
model.description: The AI model to use when executing the behavior. If not specified, the currently selected model in the environment is used.

instructions.description: This is where you provide specific prompts, guidelines, or any other relevant information that you want the agent to follow when exhibiting this behavior in the IDE. You can also reference instruction files by using Markdown links. These instructions will complement whatever is specified in the main prompt.
